column4: ok guys please, before I throw away ubuntu because of FF please give me an alternative webbrowser that doesn't lag when I scroll
nautilus
what video card do you have ?
some nvidea dedicated with 64 megs of ram
I ask as a common cause for visual lag is the wrong drivers for nvidia cards
how can I check my graphics card again?
your on 8.10 ?
I even think it doesn't utilize the GPU AT ALL
yes I am
if you open hardware drivers from system -> administration does it show any nvidia drivers in use
no
ahhh that could be the issue
does it show any as available but not in use ?
no
which card is it exactly (if you know)
I don't :( i could boot into windowz and find out
that would be with it in my opinion
it's a common cause of slow visual
I agree 100% as I suspected from the begining my GPU isn't working as it should, but how do I get the right driveR?
lets find out the card, then we can work onthat
k ill switch to other machine
